title: AppMLDatabase

metadata.description: Learn about AppMLDatabase with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Create Your Own Web SQL Database
With the small utility below, you can use AppML to create your own Web SQL 
database.
Write your own SQL, or use the buttons to import existing SQL.
WebSQL only works in Chrome and Safari.
Customers
Products
Suppliers
Shippers
Categories
Employees
Orders
Run SQL

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers AppMLDatabase concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use AppMLDatabase effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of AppMLDatabase and how to apply it in your projects.
